add_library(sdl INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(sdl INTERFACE include)
set(sdl_lib_dir "lib/${VE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
target_link_directories(sdl INTERFACE "lib/${VE_PLATFORM_NAME}")
target_link_libraries(sdl INTERFACE SDL2 SDL2main)
if(VE_WINDOWS)
  file(COPY "${sdl_lib_dir}/SDL2.dll" DESTINATION "${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY}/Debug")
  file(COPY "${sdl_lib_dir}/SDL2.dll" DESTINATION "${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY}/Release")
endif()
